page.title: 09Fashions in N.Duffield
page.content: Fashions of North Duffield are very plain. We went out and asked several people what kind of clothes they liked wearing best.Older women liked wearing dresses best,with wedged heels shoes to match. They don't bother about make-up,but do like wearing hats. Younger women do not like wearing hats, but like wearing skirts and tops,also they like wearing high heeled shoes. We asked one man.He liked wearing suits with a tie and shoes to match, but does not wear t-shirts,and prefers overcoats to raincoats.This man likes trilby hats better than flat caps. These are the fashions of the 1980's in a small, quiet village.
